markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Ji-Yook (Gumiho Form)](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1522)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 48

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 46

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 43
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 18">[Ji-Yook (Gumiho Form)](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1522)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
<trait label="Kitsune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=341" />
<trait label="Zombie" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=245" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain](/Sources.aspx?ID=87) pg. 47</row>

**Perception** +29; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), emotionsense

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Nagaji](/Languages.aspx?ID=87), [Tengu](/Languages.aspx?ID=47), [Tien](/Languages.aspx?ID=43); (can't speak any language)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +37, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +35, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +35, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +31

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +6

**Con** +3

**Int** +5

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +6
</row>

**Items**
_+3 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [returning](/Equipment.aspx?ID=301) [darts](/Weapons.aspx?ID=68)_ (5), _+3 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) handwraps of mighty blows_, _+2 [greater resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [explorer's clothing](/Equipment.aspx?ID=15), _ [greater smokesticks](/Equipment.aspx?ID=135) (2)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 42 

**Fort** +27 

**Ref** +34 

**Will** +29 

</row>

**HP** 331

**Immunities**
[emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60)

**Toughest Teamwork: Unsettling Murmur** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68)) **Trigger** An enemy within 60 feet is the target of a Strike or attempts a Will save; **Effect** Just when an enemy is preparing to defend itself, Ji-yook sends an illusion of herself to whisper a disquieting secret or threat into their ear. The enemy takes a –2 circumstance penalty to their AC or Will save against the triggering attack or effect.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet; waylay

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +34 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)),
**Damage** 6d4+10 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dart +34 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254), [thrown 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 6d4+10 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
foxfire +34 ([range 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [Versatile](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 6d4+8 electricity

**[Change Shape](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=8)**   Ji-yook transforms into her human form. Using Change Shape counts as creating a disguise for the [Impersonate](/Actions.aspx?ID=46) use of [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5). Ji-yook can remain in her human form indefinitely, and she can shift back to her true kitsune form by using this action again.

**Disquieting Change Shape** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) Ji-yook selects one enemy within 60 feet, then Changes Shape into humanoid form, taking the form of a person emotionally close to that enemy, such as a dead family member. Ji-yook is not aware of the form she will take until she transforms. If her target sees her, even if they are aware it is a trick, they must attempt a DC 40 Will save or be [frightened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) (frightened 2 on a critical failure) for 1 round. This is a [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68) effect.

**Foxfire Blast** <actions string="Two Actions" />  **Frequency** once per round; Effect Ji-yook makes a fist strike. On a hit, the target takes an additional 3d6 electricity damage and is [pushed](/Rules.aspx?ID=451) back 5 feet. On a critical hit, the target is pushed back and then knocked [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31).

**Pinning Shot** <actions string="Single Action" />  Ji-yook makes a dart Strike. If the attack hits, it deals no damage and instead imparts the [bow critical specialization](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=3) effect against the target. If the attack is a critical hit, the target must succeed at two separate Interact actions to pull the missile free. The target is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) while it remains [immobilized](/Conditions.aspx?ID=24) in this way.

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**   Ji-yook's Strikes deal an extra 4d6 precision damage to [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creatures.

**Waylay**  ([Illusion](/Traits.aspx?ID=92)) When Ji-yook Strides at least 10 feet, illusions make her [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) until the start of her next turn.

</column>
name: Ji-Yook (Gumiho Form)

The enemy takes a –2 circumstance penalty to their AC or Will save against the triggering attack or effect. --- Speed 25 feet; waylay Melee Single Action claw +34 (Agile, Finesse, Magical, Nonlethal, Unarmed), Damage 6d4+10 bludgeoning Ranged Single Action dart +34 (Agile, Magical, reload 0, thrown 20 feet), Damage 6d4+10 piercing Ranged Single Action foxfire +34 (range 20 feet, Versatile), Damage 6d4+8 electricity Change Shape Ji-yook transforms into her human form. Disquieting Change Shape Single Action (Concentrate, Divine, Polymorph, Transmutation) Ji-yook selects one enemy within 60 feet, then Changes Shape into humanoid form, taking the form of a person emotionally close to that enemy, such as a dead family member. Ji-yook is not aware of the form she will take until she transforms.
